issue.title: [CI][Archery] Add new Archery command to delete old branches and tags on crossbow repository
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17856](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17856). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the past we were using a script from a gist to delete old branches on the crossbow repository:

<https://gist.github.com/antonio/4586456>

Due to unclear licensing of the script we decided to remove it but we have to add a new way of having the crossbow repository clean old branches.
